lyrics:
I met her at a backyard block party by the bar
She kept lookin' at me like she knew who I was
She was buzzin' all over me
She was buzzin' all over me
She was buzzin' all over me like she fell in love

Bang bang, baby shot me in the heart
In the dark with the dart, felt the spark when it hit
When we me at the spot it was hot
Like this song, saw the thong it was on
Now it's eight in the morning
I move on like the Greyhound bus
I go town to town and I prey on sluts
I got to go, so scream out your area code
I'm comin' all the way live from the 310
I got a whole lotta love but none like you
You make me wanna stay here in Heaven with you
I write your name in the sand, put your hand with mine
Come on baby, shoot your gun in the sky

I met her at a backyard block party by the bar
She kept lookin' at me like she knew who I was
She was buzzin' all over me
She was buzzin' all over me
She was buzzin' all over me like she fell in love

Bang bang, baby hit me one time
Two days on the road and you still on my mind
You think that I would learn 'cause I'm young and fine
But I'm broke so I'm tryin' to make a hustle outta rhyme
I gotta see the world one girl at a time
But you're hangin' on my sleeve like I care that you're cryin'
And I do, I'm just tryin' to play it cool
I got a rep to protect, down at the high school
Why you try to cage me in
And when I leave we both know that you be pagin' him
And when I come back we goin' do it again.
I promise we goin' do it again.

I met her at a backyard block party by the bar (Do it again)
She kept lookin' at me like she knew who I was (Do it again)
She was buzzin' all over me
She was buzzin' all over me
She was buzzin' all over me like she fell in love

Yeah, bang bang, I wanna give you my name
But I'm tryin' to put some diamonds in my Shwayze chain
Babies change, they start showin' them fangs
Trying to take a ride on this crazy train
Choo choo, what the hell am I to do?
I got a girl in every city from here to Peru
When I left you, I signed my name on your left boob
Now go get that tattooed, I'll be back soon
Don't cry, I'll bless you with a text soon
I gotta go, but I'll be back next June
Or July, sparks in the sky
She said, "Boy, you crazy,"
Nah, I'm Shwayze

I met her at a backyard block party by the bar
She kept lookin' at me like she knew who I was
She was buzzin' all over me
She was buzzin' all over me
She was buzzin' all over me like she fell in love

And I don't know what she was on
Whatever it was, I want some
She was buzzin' all over me
She was buzzin' all over me
She was buzzin' all over me like she fell in love
